'''''Amon Hen'' 107''' is the one-hundred-and-seventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[1991]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Steve Lines
* Editorial
** By: Tony Curtis
* Contents
* Announcements
* Back-Issues
* Lending Library Supplement
* Reviews
** By: various contributors
* The [[Black Númenóreans|Black Numenoreans]]
** By: Alan Bough
* Small Press
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Letters
* Mathom
** By: Gwyneth Morgan
* Artwork: ''Under [[Misty Mountains]] Mere''
** By: Trevor Urmston
* Debi's Dabblings
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Tolk Folk
* Additional Calligraphy and Artwork
** By: Susanne Stopfel, Bryan Glenet, Kirsty Beck, Martin Roe, Mervyn Finlay, Geraint Rees & Howard J. Bates
